q: "First, we must focus on developing the underlying fast networks( generally called LTE)," Eric Schmidt writes. "Second, we must attend to the development of mobile money," he continues. Third, we want to increase the availability of inexpensive smartphones in the poorest parts of the world. I will focus on priorities two and three, in part because they're more in Google's control. I'll start with mobile money, which I've written about numerous times. In a

Asked to choose his best game of the season, Michael Vick selected the playoff game against the Packers, despite three sacks, an interception on the final throw and a season-ending loss. Honestly, it might sound crazy, but( the Packers game) I just felt so much confidence, Michael Vick told PFW. "I was just so in tune with everything: the protection, the blitz, where it was coming from, all my progressions, where everybody was supposed to be lined up.
